posts.post_content:
Add $2 for P&H. Most are cards I have upgraded.  They are certainly low grade, but priced reasonably (often less than I paid). I have a couple of shows coming up and I'm sure I can swap them if, but thought I would offer them here first. 

Updated to reflect sold cards. 

Will also consider trades. 
Quinn, Piedmont 350, Back stamp, more popular card $18
Leach bending over, Polar Bear, hard crease, $18
Herzog, Boston, Piedmont 350-460, $18
Quillen Piedmont 350, $18

My cards also hit the mail box today, thank you!!!
